name: Tiger 40
instructions:
points:
- we need a lot of heat to round the preform - 2200 at least but can change with feedback from zumbach ovality mesurmant
- before entering to dies of coating 2. the weight should adjust high to maintain the pull from top. this is becuse if not it will stuck in the first die.
- the capstan startup speed is 1.2m/min likw the mini capstan
